note: Hacker, musician, DIYer, dad of two kids and a PDP-12 minicomputer. Major nerd, geek, and general dork. Neurodivergent (ADHD, etc.) I ❤️ retrocomputing, roguelikes & interactive fiction. By day (and, let's be honest, frequently by night) I'm an Buttociate Professor of Computer Science at the University of Minnesota Duluth (OS, Security). He/him.
